targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("pointsWrittenFail"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("pointsWrittenOK"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("numMeasurements") FROM "database" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("numSeries") FROM "database" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("queryReq"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("clientError"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("serverError"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT (last("write_time") / last("writes")) AS "Write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "name" =~ /^*[0-9]$/ AND ("host" =~ /^$Instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"
SELECT (last("read_time") / last("reads")) AS "Write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "name" =~ /^*[0-9]$/ AND ("host" =~ /^$Instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

list.name: Instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES ON telegraf_internal WITH KEY = "host"
